details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.6 File provenance information
details.description: In order to describe all high-level user actions taken to create, transform or otherwise instantiate a conforming file, each of those actions should be recorded in the xmpMM:History property. For each action that is recorded the action, parameters and when fields shall be specified.
